#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 char ch[100];
int main()
{
        int i,t,count;
        cin>>t;

    while(t--)

   {
       cin>>ch;
         count = 0;
         i =0;
         while(ch[i]!='\0')
         {
               if(ch[i]=='A'|| ch[i]=='D'||ch[i]=='O' || ch[i]=='P' || ch[i]=='Q' || ch[i] =='R')
               count++;
               if(ch[i]=='B')
               count+=2;
               ++i;
          }
          printf("%d\n",count);
     }

    return 0;
}
